author: veithen
msg: Avoid the call to Part#getSize() because this requires buffering of the part, which prevents us from implementing streaming (AXIOM-377) properly.
The code was introduced by AXIOM-383 but is actually unnecessary:
* The buffering logic works well with with empty attachments.
* The case where "the stream end[s] without having a MIME message terminator" is irrelevant because such a message should generate an exception.

author: lektran
msg: Replace code with a call to ModelService.makeValid(...) which does the same thing

author: nash
msg: TUSCANY-2735: Add tests for generic types
